message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $15,000. I believe it will greatly benefit you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling the product for $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is below its true value. Could you meet me at $13,000?
I see, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I am still working within a tight budget. Could we perhaps agree on $12,000 for the product?
